page.title: 06PIG FARM _ WOODSIDE(PART I)
page.content: This is one of 3 owned by{CAVAGHAN} and{GRAY LTD.}of Carlisle.It is managed by a husband and wife team helped by a student.It is an intensive farm,the pigs being kept in single pens indoors.Here there are 300 breeding sows and 16 boars.Each litter averages 9 to 10 piglets which weigh about 3 to 4Kg each at birth.Each sow has 2.3 litters a year.The pigs are kept for 5.5 months when they weigh about 90Kgs.The animals are fed on a mixture of barley,soya,vitamins and minerals in exact amounts worked out each time by a computer.The farm has a 250 acre field which it uses to grow barley but this is not enough and most of the food has to be bought in.One interesting thing that we were told is that when pigs are born they have { {tusks}which have to be cut out or they would hurt each other.
